title: Skill Up
desc: It's a website for selling courses. It have dynamic and protected course description with check out page and anyone can choose and buy courses.
features: authentication with Firebase
Customer can see what service we provide.
Beautyfull Course Description with Details.
Upon Clicking they will go Checkout Page
In Details page , Buyer can see product price, tax and totall price.
In Course Section, Buyer Can see all courses we provide.

title: Book worm
desc: It's a Second Hand book Buy and Sell website with customized dashboard where a Seller/Buyer/Admin have a separate private route and organized their product easily.
features: Catagory based Product
Advertised Product in Home Section
Seller, Buyer, Admin has Different Dashboard.
Buyer can see and delete his order and wishlist.
Buyer can payment with Stripe  payment mathod.
Seller can see their product and Add new products
Seller can see who bought their product.
Seller can Contact the buyer.
admin can see all user and delete them.
Admin also can varify a seller and its will mark in beside seller name.
Admin can also see all buyer and delete them.

title: Mind Talking
desc: It's a Personal Psychotherapist/psychologist website where patient can choose service and make sure appointment by paying on strip.
features: User can see what service provided.
By Clicking Service secton, patient can see all services.
Detaiils description of all service.
Patient can comment/Review any service.
Patient can see all their review and can delete/Edit them
Patient can see available appointment time and Date.
Patient also can appointment with available time and date
After appointment they can pay appointment fee with Stripe.
In dashboard, They can see what service they have taken and delete them.
Admin can add services
Admin also can add doctors for appointment.
admin can appoint Doctors for any appointment

title: Task Manager
desc: A task Manager app where you can track your task,add task, mark it ongoing and complete.
features: User can track their task
User can add their task
user can delete any task
user can mark task as complete and it will show their complete section
In my task section user can see all their task list
user can add task as project base
user can search their project
authentication with Next auth
dark and light mode

title: Knock Knock
desc: Knock Knock is a real time chat application where user can communicate with another users
features: authentication with Next auth
Real time chat with any users
Delete Conversation with all messages
Prisma use, so code can be use for any database
Images upload with cloudinary images hosting server
real time data with pusher
offline or online status
